cards.name: Adventure
cards.description: Seeks out and/or participates in exciting events that involve uncertainty

cards.name: Autonomy
cards.description: Places importance on freedom, independence and individual discretion

cards.name: Challenges
cards.description: Things or situations that test a person's thoughts or abilities

cards.name: Change
cards.description: A shift from one state, stage or phase to another

cards.name: Community
cards.description: A group of people with a common background or characteristic or with shared interests

cards.name: Competence
cards.description: Ability to solve problems, demonstrates mastery

cards.name: Competition
cards.description: Comparison of self, team or organization against oneself or another

cards.name: Cooperation
cards.description: Placing importance on working together to achieve results; go along with a role

cards.name: Creativity
cards.description: Placing importance on imagination, inspiration and inventiveness

cards.name: Decisiveness
cards.description: The ability to make decisions firmly, clearly, conclusively and in a timely manner

cards.name: Diversity
cards.description: Appreciates and respects individual differences

cards.name: Environment
cards.description: Awareness of natural resources

cards.name: Education
cards.description: Placing importance on learning and education

cards.name: Ethics
cards.description: Valuing moral standards

cards.name: Excellence
cards.description: Pursuit of the highest level of optimal performance

cards.name: Excitement
cards.description: Things that engage attention and/or emotion, in a lively, stimulating and compelling way

cards.name: Fairness
cards.description: Placing importance in justice, decency and equality

cards.name: Fame
cards.description: Recognition by others, desire to be well-known

cards.name: Family
cards.description: Connection to immediate or expended relations

cards.name: Flexibility
cards.description: The ability to adapt to environments, situations or changes

cards.name: Freedom
cards.description: Without obligation

cards.name: Friendship
cards.description: Strong ties with family, friends, co-workers or members of a certain community

cards.name: Happiness
cards.description: Feelings of contentment, satisfaction and/or fulfillment

cards.name: Health
cards.description: Placing importance on physical and emotional well-being

cards.name: Helping Others
cards.description: placing importance on assisting other people

cards.name: Honesty
cards.description: Telling the truth, does not engage in deception, is forthright and candid

cards.name: Independence
cards.description: Ability to be self-directed in one's thoughts and actions

cards.name: Integrity
cards.description: Firm adherence to a moral code and/or set of values, walking the talk

cards.name: Leadership
cards.description: The ability to create relationships in order to complete a stated goal or mission

cards.name: Loyalty
cards.description: Allegiances to people, organizations, ideals, causes, etc.

cards.name: Meaningful Work
cards.description: Doing and providing work that has a purpose and/or significance

cards.name: Money
cards.description: Financial assets, the accumulation of wealth

cards.name: Order
cards.description: Adherence to a system, protocol or code

cards.name: Philanthropy
cards.description: Giving of monetary gifts in order to benefit others

cards.name: Play
cards.description: Imagination, spontaneity; the ability to be amused

cards.name: Pleasure
cards.description: Enjoyment, delight, satisfaction or fulfillment

cards.name: Power
cards.description: Strength, superiority, dominance and/or authority

cards.name: Privacy
cards.description: The need for solitude or separateness

cards.name: Recognition
cards.description: Acknowledgment and/or validation

cards.name: Relationships
cards.description: Connections between and among people

cards.name: Religion
cards.description: A specific system of belief or worship

cards.name: Safety
cards.description: A concern for the security and well-being of one's self and/or others

cards.name: Security
cards.description: The feeling of being protected or safeguarded from danger, a sense of comfort

cards.name: Service
cards.description: Placing importance on serving others with quality and value

cards.name: Spirituality
cards.description: Appreciating the need to understand one's inner self and its relationship with the world

cards.name: Stability
cards.description: Taking on day-to-day activities in a calm and consistent manner

cards.name: Status
cards.description: Placing importance on the rank or position of something in a relationship or group

cards.name: Wealth
cards.description: richness in terms of assets or money

cards.name: Work
cards.description: Employment, occupation, or fulfillment of a task or duty
